mapper.select: SELECT A.PRO_NUM,A.TITLE,A.PRICE,A.CATE_CODE,A.STATE_MSG,A.PLACE_SIGNAL,B.UUID,B.UPLOADPATH,B.FILENAME,B.REP FROM PRODUCTION A , PRODUCTION_UPLOAD B WHERE B.REP = 1 AND A.PRO_NUM = B.PRO_NUM

SELECT A.PRO_NUM,A.TITLE,A.PRICE,A.CONTENT,A.CREATE_DATE,A.ADDR, A.PLACE_PICK,A.P_QUALITY,A.STATE_MSG,A.CATE_CODE, B.M_NUM,B.NICKNAME,B.PHONE,B.MANNER,B.IMG_PATH,B.FILENAME,B.INTRO FROM PRODUCTION A , (SELECT * FROM MEMBER) B WHERE A.M_NUM = B.M_NUM AND A.PRO_NUM = #{pro_num}

SELECT A.PRO_NUM,A.TITLE,A.PRICE,A.CATE_CODE,A.STATE_MSG,A.PLACE_SIGNAL,A.CREATE_DATE,A.ADDR,A.PLACE_PICK,B.UUID,B.UPLOADPATH,B.FILENAME,B.REP FROM PRODUCTION A , PRODUCTION_UPLOAD B WHERE B.REP = 1 AND CATE_CODE=#{cate_code} AND A.PRO_NUM = B.PRO_NUM

SELECT A.PRO_NUM,A.TITLE,A.PRICE,A.CATE_CODE,A.STATE_MSG,A.PLACE_SIGNAL,A.CREATE_DATE,A.ADDR,A.PLACE_PICK,B.UUID,B.UPLOADPATH,B.FILENAME,B.REP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over( order by price DESC order by price ASC order by price ASC ) as rn ,PRO_NUM,TITLE,PRICE,CATE_CODE,STATE_MSG,PLACE_SIGNAL,CREATE_DATE,ADDR,PLACE_PICK FROM PRODUCTION WHERE CATE_CODE = #{cate_code} ) A , PRODUCTION_UPLOAD B WHERE A.PRO_NUM = B.PRO_NUM AND B.REP = 1
AND A.rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND A.rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
ORDER BY A.PRICE DESC
ORDER BY A.PRICE ASC
ORDER BY A.PRICE ASC
